creator: DonkeyCat GmbH
descriptionHtml:
The popular classic board game Four In A Row also known as Captain's Mistress,Four Up,Vier Gewinnt ,Lig 4, Forza Quattro or Connect 4 is now available for free with online multiplayer mode

Easy Rules - User your Brain🧠
Four in a row is a simple and very easy to learn board game like Tic Tac Toe - The rules are just as simple as in tic tac toe, but connect four demands a much better strategy as instead of 3 in a row you need to have four - so you need to have a better strategy than you opponent when you try to connect four pieces to win the game.

Online multiplayer 👥
Play this brain game online 1v1 against players around the world also trying to connect 4 in a row. No login is necessary. Send you opponent emojis during the online game 😂

Offline multiplayer 🆚
Play offline against your friend on one device 1vs1 in hotseat mode

Computer opponents 👤🤖
Test your strategy and train your brain against three different computer opponent skills

High Scores 🏆
Compare your ELO, coins won and your game statistics with thousands of other players.

Four In A Row is a fast puzzle strategy game that is easy to learn and offers both beginners and experienced players strategic challenges. One of the classic board games like Checkers, Chess or Ludo.

Other names or similar variants of the games include Score Four, Find Four, Noughts and Crosses, Qubic, Teeko, Picaria, Gravitrips, Kunligu Kvar, Conecta 4, Puissance 4, Fyra i rad Cestovní piškvorky, Neljän suora, Fire på stribe, Czwórki, Vier gewinnt, Plot Four, Fourplay, Four in a Line

descriptionShort: Free Multiplayer Board Game - Four in A Row
title: Four in a Row Online Board Game

creator: DonkeyCat GmbH
descriptionHtml:
The popular classic board game Four In A Row also known as Captain's Mistress, Four Up, Vier Gewinnt, Lig 4, Forza Quattro or Connect 4 is now available for free with online multiplayer mode.

Easy Rules like on Tic Tac Toe🧠
Four in a row is a simple and very easy to learn board game like Tic Tac Toe - The rules are just as simple as in tic tac toe. As instead of three pieces you need to connect four in a row - so you need to have a better strategy than your opponent when you try to connect four pieces to win. Play connect 4 online, challenge your friends and level up - perfect for 2 players. Get ready to train your brain with online board games.

No matter with whom you want to play online board games - we offer you to play with friends, against players around the world or computer opponents. You can also choose if you want to join a game online or offline - wherever and whenever you want to.

Online multiplayer 👥
Do you feel like playing online board games and hit the score? We got you covered - play this strategy game online 1v1 against players around the world also trying to connect four in a row. Enjoy online multiplayer games with friends or players from all over the globe. Become part of the community, send your opponent emojis during the board game, connect four in a row, level up and hit the score. No login is necessary. All you need to do is to download the app and you are all set to train your brain with strategy games - play multiplayer games with friends and players around the world who are also trying to connect the dots and boxes.

Offline multiplayer 🆚
No internet connection? No problem! We offer you the strategy games experience also offline. Play 4 in a row in offline multiplayer games with friends on one device 1vs1 in hotseat mode. Are you ready to connect 4 in a row, level up and enjoy the board game?

Computer opponents 👤🤖
Do you want to train your brain with classic board games? We got you covered with the connect 4 multiplayer mode. Play four in a row also against three different computer opponent skills who all try to connect 4 in a row before you do. Level up and enjoy. Come and join the board game, wherever and whenever you want to with connect 4 online.

High Scores 🏆
Compare your ELO, coins won and your statistics with thousands of other 4 in a Row players. Even if the rules are just as simple as in tic tac toe, the connect 4 online and offline board game demands a better approach than other strategy games in order to beat the score. Convince yourself, challenge your friends, level up and hit the score.

Four In A Row is a fast puzzle strategy game that is easy to learn and offers both beginners and experienced players strategic challenges. This is one of the classic board games like Checkers, Domino, Chess or Ludo. The first player to connect four stones wins. Are you ready to challenge your friends and other players around the world?

Other names or similar variants of the board game include Score Four, Find Four, Noughts and Crosses, Qubic, Teeko, Picaria, Gravitrips, Kunligu Kvar, Conecta 4, Puissance 4, Vier gewinnt, Plot Four, Fourplay or Four in a Line

No matter with whom you want to play online board games - it is up to you to choose if you want to play connect 4 with friends, against players around the world or computer opponents. You can also choose if you want to join a connect 4 multiplayer game online or offline - wherever and whenever you want to.

So what are you waiting for? Come and join the strategy games community, play connect 4 with friends, online multiplayer opponents or computers and discover the classic board games experience online as well as offline.
descriptionShort: Multiplayer games with friends for 2 players. Connecting four in a row online
